summary: SummaryHighlightsClean Ingredientsma:nyo Bifida Biome Ampoule Toner is an ampoule-in-toner that helps to fortify the skin barrier. It gently exfoliates with PHA and helps refine pores.
details: DetailsFeaturesAmpoule+ Toner. Non-sticky Ampoule Toner that penetrates deep into the skin to keep it fresh, hydrated, and protected.Firm, healthy skin that glows from the inside. Inflammation-calming, dead skin-dissolving, and texture-smoothing.Essential for sensitive and dried skin that reacts and easily gets irritated to the subtle changes in the environment.Key IngredientsBifida Biome - Builds up the skin’s barrier and keeps well-balanced skin condition.5 Probiotics - Strengthens the skin's barrier and helps the skin restore its original complexion.PHA - Exfoliates dead skin cells on the surface, resulting in a even skin tone and texture.Formulated WithoutFragranceSiliconParabenItem 2626874How To UseSaturate a cotton pad with the toner and gently sweep across the face.Apply morning and evening, following cleansing and before the serum.IngredientsWater, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Lactococcus Ferment Lysate, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Ferment Extract, Saccharomyces Ferment Filtrate, Betaine, Allantoin, Panthenol, Ceramide NP, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Bifida Ferment Filtrate, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Xylitol, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitylglucoside, Glucose, 1,2-Hexanediol, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Lactobionic Acid, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Cutibacterium Granulosum Ferment Extract Filtrate(10ppb), Fructose, Fructooligosaccharides, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Benzyl Glycol, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract.
how_to_use: Saturate a cotton pad with the toner and gently sweep across the face.Apply morning and evening, following cleansing and before the serum.

reviews.headline: Will definitely repurchase
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This has got to be one of the best toners I've ever used. I use it daily in the AM and PM. My skin has never looked better. I love that there isn't a distinct smell either. My serums and moisturizers go in flawlessly.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Applied with a cotton pad before my lotion. Left my skin feeling soft and clean.  Definitely adding to my routine!  Not too strongly scented which I really appreciated.

reviews.headline: Yes! Love!!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I thoroughly enjoyed this and have added it to my skincare routine care routine. I would definitely recommend but since everyone's skin reacts differently I would say for you to decide if this one is best for you. But honestly I have sensitive skin and it did not break me out or leave a weird texture of any sort.

reviews.headline: Loved
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I live this toner. It feels so good on my skin. It's very cooling and hydrating on the skin. There is no smell. But make my skin feel great. And cleans my pores

reviews.headline: Smooth hydrated skin
reviews.comments: The ma:nyo Bifida Biome Ampoule Toner has been a game-changer for my routine. It feels soothing yet effective, helping strengthen my skin barrier while gently refining pores. My skin looks smoother, feels healthier, and has a nice glow without irritation.

reviews.headline: Healthy Glow Guaranteed
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This product is definitely did improve my skin barrier. My face looks healthier and immediately hydrated after application. What's interesting its super watery and does not leave any residue; only a healthy glow. Sets perfectly under makeup.

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I am absolutely in love with this toner. It's refreshing and not too harsh, even though it's exfoliating. It leaves my skin super soft and has even cleared up stubborn pregnancy breakouts that no other product has been able to!

reviews.headline: Better than more pricy brands by a mile!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This toner is life! I have a real problem with "chicken skin" and this has helped to clear it up so well!! It's nourishing and calming with zero irritation. I will always keep this on hand it's as good as more expensive brands at a very reasonable price poiny!

reviews.headline: I loved this toner!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Super happy with this product! I don't typically use a toner in my skincare routine but I decided to give it a try with this toner and I'm glad I did. I only used it 3-4 times a week. I did have some dryness but that's my skin, not the toner. There isn't a scent which is nice because those products are harsh on my skin. The packaging is simple and to the point. The ingredients list is easy to read and understand. And it gets the job done!

reviews.headline: Good toner
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This a nice lightweight toner that works hydrates and softens the skin. It's a good first step after cleansing as it helps restore some of the moisture back in your skin. It has PHA in it, but I don't find that to be a super strong exfoliant so there was no issues with irritation or using other exfoliants in my routine

reviews.headline: This is my new toner staple
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review]
Starting with the design of the bottle it's super easy to open and close and get product out versus some other brands I've used where you have to violently shake them. I even took it on a trip and it traveled super well. Now to the actual product. I honestly love it. I use it every day and night. I struggle with oiliness in my tzone and this has totally curbed that. No more splotchiness. The overall balance of my face is just great. All summer I've felt hydrated without feeling dry or oily. It has zero smell which I'm also a fan of and it isn't sticky or leaves a residue. It really is like a perfect basic staple toner and it doesn't break the bank.

reviews.headline: Good toner
reviews.comments: Upon opening the product, I was amazed how well sealed it was. The product had box scent or coloring. The product cleaned my face and left my face feeling hydrated and clean.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This is a great every day toner. I've been using it daily and it's evened out my skin tone. It's gentle, effective, doesn't have a strong scent, absorbs really nicely into the skin and is easy to use!

reviews.headline: Great hydrating toner!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] With all the craziness in the world it's time for some self-care. Drink some water. Hydrate you skin. I've been testing out ma:nyo Bifida Biome toner - and I'm pleasantly surprised how much more even my skin tone is and more hydrated. This toner supports your skin's microbiome, reduces irritation, and locks in hydration. A toner that works like treatment ✨

reviews.headline: Great Toner!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I have normal/ combo skin with some fine lines,  dullness, texture and enlarged pores. This toner worked great for me! It feels hydrating but not sticky or oily. A little goes a long way and it sinks into my skin quickly.  Since using it twice a day for about a month I've noticed my texture is reduced and my skin has a healthy glow.  Definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: Best results along t-zone.
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I noticed this worked well with dealing with oily t-zone area. I've also noticed that it doesn't dry out my skin and my forehead feels a bit smoother. I didn't notice any changes on my cheeks but I also don't really have any issues or large pores on that area. Overall I liked this, there's no scent and it didn't dry out my skin.

reviews.headline: Great Ampoule Toner!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I like this ampoule toner, it is hydrating and leaves my skin looking plump and fresh! It doesn't irritate my skin or cause breakouts and is perfect for my sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: Perfect toner
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I received the Bifida Biome Ampoule Toner
 It helps to fortify the skin barrier as it gently exfoliates and helps refinepores.this is soo easy to apply. And no harsh smell.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This has been working so well with y skin. It absorbs nicely without grease. The smell is light and nice.  The ingredients are on par for what I look for in skincare.  And thr package is easy to open.

reviews.headline: A true k-beauty gem!
reviews.comments: I have received the ma:nyo Bifida Biome Ampoule Toner in exchange for my honest review. I have been consistently implementing this dual-function ampoule-toner into my skincare routine for almost 6 weeks and I can see and feel a substantial difference in my skin! As a New York licensed esthetician, I am very mindful of the formulations and ingredients of the skin care products I choose to put on my skin. This toner is packed with clinical-quality ingredient and I found it very easy to incorporate into my daily routine. The directions on the bottle state; "apply after cleansing (morning and night ) with clean hands or a cotton pad. I was initially concerned that the toner would react negatively with the actives (vitamin c & retinol)that I rotate in my nightly routine due to its mild exfoliating properties; but I was pleasantly surprised that I experienced no adverse reactions. I would still do a patch test, though, because as with everything you apply to your skin… reactions are on a case-by-case basis. After applying the toner-ampoule I was left with soft, hydrated, and bouncy skin. The viscous formula was quickly absorbed and left no sticky residue! I found the formula to be very soothing and I really love that it is meant to strengthen my skin barrier. I also appreciate that it is thoughtfully formulated with all skin types in mind, especially those with sensitivities and/or dehydrated skin. All in all, I would recommend ma:nyo 's Bifida Biome Ampoule Toner to any of my esthetics clients and friends that are seeking balanced and hydrated skin… especially with sensitive skin with a compromised skin barrier. There is little to no risk of irritation due to its mild ingredients. Consequently, I will continue to use this gem-of-a-toner and I can't wait to try more products from this widely-acclaimed K-Beauty brand! 5/5 stars!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have received the ma:nyo Bifida Biome Ampoule Toner in exchange for my honest review. I have been consistently implementing this dual-function ampoule-toner into my skincare routine for almost 6 weeks and I can see and feel a substantial difference in my skin! As a New York licensed esthetician, I am very mindful of the formulations and ingredients of the skin care products I choose to put on my skin. This toner is packed with clinical-quality ingredient and I found it very easy to incorporate into my daily routine. The directions on the bottle state; "apply after cleansing (morning and night ) with clean hands or a cotton pad. I was initially concerned that the toner would react negatively with the actives (vitamin c & retinol)that I rotate in my nightly routine due to its mild exfoliating properties; but I was pleasantly surprised that I experienced no adverse reactions. I would still do a patch test, though, because as with everything you apply to your skin… reactions are on a case-by-case basis. After applying the toner-ampoule I was left with soft, hydrated, and bouncy skin. The viscous formula was quickly absorbed and left no sticky residue! I found the formula to be very soothing and I really love that it is meant to strengthen my skin barrier. I also appreciate that it is thoughtfully formulated with all skin types in mind, especially those with sensitivities and/or dehydrated skin. All in all, I would recommend ma:nyo 's Bifida Biome Ampoule Toner to any of my esthetics clients and friends that are seeking balanced and hydrated skin… especially with sensitive skin with a compromised skin barrier. There is little to no risk of irritation due to its mild ingredients. Consequently, I will continue to use this gem-of-a-toner and I can't wait to try more products from this widely-acclaimed K-Beauty brand! 5/5 stars!
faceoff_positive.headline: A true k-beauty gem!

faceoff_negative.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This toner felt really nice going on my skin. It never burned and there was no harsh smell. However, I did start breaking out shortly after adding this to my skincare routine. I didn't change anything else, so it was either a fluke or caused by this toner. I stopped using it after a few weeks and my skin went back to normal. I'm not sure if it would have gone away on its own after my skin got used to the product. I received this as a complimentary product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Would not repurchase
